channel.title: DS3 Level on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in DS3 Level on 0x000216

item.title: Ethernet Over Copper Can Be A Lifesaver
item.description: Imagine your company facing a critical situation. It’s growing, and you need more bandwidth than your reliable T1 line can offer. Upgrading to DS3 seems logical, but your provider can only offer a limited increase, nowhere near the 25 or 50 Mbps you require. They suggest fiber optic service, but your location lacks it, meaning months of waiting and a hefty construction bill. This presents a difficult choice: secure funding and wait for fiber installation, or relocate to a fiber-ready area.
